display_long_description:
Balls To The Wall™ is a mixed reality puzzle game featuring 20 levels of arcade style action! Shoot groups of 3 or more marbles to score points, swap marbles to build longer chains and score higher! Featuring special power boosts and sneaky obstacles. Create a multiplayer room and challenge a friend!
[media]
Swap marbles around to make larger groups of the same color. Then shoot one to destroy the chain. Choose your target wisely though. If you make an L or T shape, you will have to shoot the marble that connects both lines of the shape to destroy both lines. 
[media]
When you score high, special crystal items appear. Shoot them to destroy all of the marbles of that color on the board and get even more points!
[media]
Watch out for bombs. If you hit a bomb, it will destroy the marbles around it and cost you points!
There are 3 levels of challenge, each with their own leaderboard. Master your skills in Casual mode, and then take on the Pros on the Hard Core leaderboard.
